00020 class XPrimaryDriver : public XDriver
00021 {
00022     XNODE_OBJECT
00023 protected:
00024     XPrimaryDriver(const char *name, bool runtime, 
00025                    const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00026                    const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00027                    const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00028                    const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00029 public:
00030     virtual ~XPrimaryDriver() {}
00031   
00032     //! show all forms belonging to driver
00033     virtual void showForms() = 0;
00034   
00035     template <typename tVar>
00036     inline static void push(tVar, std::vector<char> &buf);
00037 
00038     template <typename tVar>
00039     inline static tVar pop(std::vector<char>::iterator &it);
00040   
00041     virtual const shared_ptr<XRecordDependency> dependency() const 
00042     {return shared_ptr<XRecordDependency>();}
00043 
00044 
00045     //! Shut down your threads, unconnect GUI, and deactivate signals
00046     //! this may be called even if driver has already stopped.
00047     //! This should not cause an exception.
00048     virtual void stop() = 0;  
00049 protected:
00050     //! Start up your threads, connect GUI, and activate signals
00051     //! This should not cause an exception.
00052     virtual void start() = 0;
00053     //! Be called for closing interfaces.
00054     //! This should not cause an exception.
00055     virtual void afterStop() = 0;  
00056     
00057     //! this is called when raw is written 
00058     //! unless dependency is broken
00059     //! convert raw to record
00060     //! \sa analyze()
00061     virtual void analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&) = 0;
00062   
00063     //! clear thread-local raw buffer.
00064     void clearRaw() {rawData().clear();}
00065     //! will call analyzeRaw() if dependency.
00066     //! unless dependency is broken.
00067     //! \arg time_awared time when a visible phenomenon started
00068     //! \arg time_recorded usually pass \p XTime::now()
00069     //! \sa timeAwared()
00070     //! \sa time()
00071     void finishWritingRaw(const XTime &time_awared, const XTime &time_recorded);
00072     //! Raw data. Thread-Local storaged.
00073     //! \sa rawDataPopIterator(), push(), pop()
00074     std::vector<char> &rawData() {return *s_tlRawData;}
00075 
00076     //! These are FIFO (fast in fast out)
00077     //! Push raw data to raw record
00078     //! Use signed/unsigned char, int16_t(16bit), and int32_t for integers.
00079     //! IEEE 754 float and double for floting point numbers.
00080     //! Little endian bytes will be stored into thread-local \sa rawData().
00081     //! \sa pop(), rawData()
00082     template <typename tVar>
00083     inline void push(tVar);
00084     //! read raw record
00085     //! \sa push(), rawData()
00086     template <typename tVar>
00087     inline tVar pop() throw (XBufferUnderflowRecordError&);
00088     //! Iterator for \a rawData().
00089     //! \sa rawData(), push(), pop()
00090     std::vector<char>::iterator& rawDataPopIterator() {return *s_tl_pop_it;}
00091 private:
00092     friend class XRawStreamRecordReader;
00093     friend class XRawStreamRecorder;
00094 
00095     //! raw data
00096     static XThreadLocal<std::vector<char> > s_tlRawData;
00097     typedef std::vector<char>::iterator RawData_it;
00098     static XThreadLocal<RawData_it> s_tl_pop_it;
00099   
00100     inline static void _push_char(char, std::vector<char> &buf);
00101     inline static void _push_int16_t(int16_t, std::vector<char> &buf);
00102     inline static void _push_int32_t(int32_t, std::vector<char> &buf);
00103     inline static void _push_double(double, std::vector<char> &buf);
00104     inline static char _pop_char(std::vector<char>::iterator &it);
00105     inline static int16_t _pop_int16_t(std::vector<char>::iterator &it);
00106     inline static int32_t _pop_int32_t(std::vector<char>::iterator &it);
00107     inline static double _pop_double(std::vector<char>::iterator &it);
00108 };
00109 
00110 inline void
00111 XPrimaryDriver::_push_char(char x, std::vector<char> &buf) {
00112     buf.push_back(x);
00113 }
00114 inline void
00115 XPrimaryDriver::_push_int16_t(int16_t x, std::vector<char> &buf) {
00116     int16_t y = x;
00117     char *p = reinterpret_cast<char *>(&y);
00118 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN__
00119     for(char *z = p + sizeof(x) - 1; z >= p; z--) {
00120 #else
00121     for(char *z = p; z < p + sizeof(x); z++) {
00122 #endif
00123         buf.push_back(*z);
00124     }
00125 }
00126 inline void
00127     XPrimaryDriver::_push_int32_t(int32_t x, std::vector<char> &buf) {
00128     int32_t y = x;
00129     char *p = reinterpret_cast<char *>(&y);
00130 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN__
00131     for(char *z = p + sizeof(x) - 1; z >= p; z--) {
00132 #else
00133     for(char *z = p; z < p + sizeof(x); z++) {
00134 #endif
00135         buf.push_back(*z);
00136     }
00137 }
00138 inline void
00139     XPrimaryDriver::_push_double(double x, std::vector<char> &buf) {
00140     C_ASSERT(sizeof(double) == 8); // for compatibility.
00141     double y = x;
00142     char *p = reinterpret_cast<char *>(&y);
00143 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN__
00144     for(char *z = p + sizeof(x) - 1; z >= p; z--) {
00145 #else
00146     for(char *z = p; z < p + sizeof(x); z++) {
00147 #endif
00148         buf.push_back(*z);
00149     }
00150 }
00151 inline char
00152     XPrimaryDriver::_pop_char(std::vector<char>::iterator &it) {
00153     char c = *(it++);
00154     return c;
00155 }
00156 inline int16_t
00157     XPrimaryDriver::_pop_int16_t(std::vector<char>::iterator &it) {
00158     union {
00159         int16_t x;
00160         char p[sizeof(int16_t)];
00161     } uni;
00162 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN__
00163     for(char *z = uni.p + sizeof(uni) - 1; z >= uni.p; z--) {
00164 #else
00165     for(char *z = uni.p; z < uni.p + sizeof(uni); z++) {
00166 #endif
00167         *z = *(it++);
00168     }
00169     return uni.x;
00170 }
00171 inline int32_t
00172 XPrimaryDriver::_pop_int32_t(std::vector<char>::iterator &it) {
00173     union {
00174         int32_t x;
00175         char p[sizeof(int32_t)];
00176     } uni;
00177 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN__
00178     for(char *z = uni.p + sizeof(uni) - 1; z >= uni.p; z--) {
00179 #else
00180     for(char *z = uni.p; z < uni.p + sizeof(uni); z++) {
00181 #endif
00182         *z = *(it++);
00183     }
00184     return uni.x;
00185 }
00186 inline double
00187     XPrimaryDriver::_pop_double(std::vector<char>::iterator &it) {
00188     union {
00189         double x;
00190         char p[sizeof(double)];
00191     } uni;
00192 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN__
00193     for(char *z = uni.p + sizeof(uni) - 1; z >= uni.p; z--) {
00194 #else
00195         for(char *z = uni.p; z < uni.p + sizeof(uni); z++) {
00196 #endif
00197             *z = *(it++);
00198         }
00199         return uni.x;
00200     }

00202 template <>
00203     inline char XPrimaryDriver::pop() throw (XBufferUnderflowRecordError&) {
00204     if(*s_tl_pop_it + sizeof(char) > rawData().end()) throw XBufferUnderflowRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00205     return _pop_char(*s_tl_pop_it);
00206 }
00207 template <>
00208     inline unsigned char XPrimaryDriver::pop() throw (XBufferUnderflowRecordError&) {
00209     if(*s_tl_pop_it + sizeof(char) > rawData().end()) throw XBufferUnderflowRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00210     return static_cast<unsigned char>(_pop_char(*s_tl_pop_it));
00211 }
00212 template <>
00213     inline int16_t XPrimaryDriver::pop() throw (XBufferUnderflowRecordError&) {
00214     if(*s_tl_pop_it + sizeof(int16_t) > rawData().end()) throw XBufferUnderflowRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00215     return _pop_int16_t(*s_tl_pop_it);
00216 }
00217 template <>
00218     inline uint16_t XPrimaryDriver::pop() throw (XBufferUnderflowRecordError&) {
00219     if(*s_tl_pop_it + sizeof(int16_t) > rawData().end()) throw XBufferUnderflowRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00220     return static_cast<uint16_t>(_pop_int16_t(*s_tl_pop_it));
00221 }
00222 template <>
00223     inline int32_t XPrimaryDriver::pop() throw (XBufferUnderflowRecordError&) {
00224     if(*s_tl_pop_it + sizeof(int32_t) > rawData().end()) throw XBufferUnderflowRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00225     return _pop_int32_t(*s_tl_pop_it);
00226 }
00227 template <>
00228     inline uint32_t XPrimaryDriver::pop() throw (XBufferUnderflowRecordError&) {
00229     if(*s_tl_pop_it + sizeof(int32_t) > rawData().end()) throw XBufferUnderflowRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00230     return static_cast<uint32_t>(_pop_int32_t(*s_tl_pop_it));
00231 }
00232 template <>
00233     inline float XPrimaryDriver::pop() throw (XBufferUnderflowRecordError&) {
00234     if(*s_tl_pop_it + sizeof(float) > rawData().end()) throw XBufferUnderflowRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00235     union {
00236         int32_t x;
00237         float y;
00238     } uni;
00239     C_ASSERT(sizeof(uni.x) == sizeof(uni.y));
00240     uni.x = _pop_int32_t(*s_tl_pop_it);
00241     return uni.y;
00242 }
00243 template <>
00244     inline double XPrimaryDriver::pop() throw (XBufferUnderflowRecordError&) {
00245     if(*s_tl_pop_it + sizeof(double) > rawData().end()) throw XBufferUnderflowRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00246     C_ASSERT(sizeof(double) == 8);
00247     return _pop_double(*s_tl_pop_it);
00248 }

00252     return _pop_char(it);

00260     return _pop_int16_t(it);

00264     return static_cast<uint16_t>(_pop_int16_t(it));
00265 }

00268     return _pop_int32_t(it);
00269 }
00270 template <>
00271     inline uint32_t XPrimaryDriver::pop(std::vector<char>::iterator &it) {
00272     return static_cast<uint32_t>(_pop_int32_t(it));
00273 }
00274 template <>
00275     inline float XPrimaryDriver::pop(std::vector<char>::iterator &it) {
00276     union {
00277         int32_t x;
00278         float y;
00279     } uni;
00280     C_ASSERT(sizeof(uni.x) == sizeof(uni.y));
00281     uni.x = _pop_int32_t(it);
00282     return uni.y;
00283 }
00284 template <>
00285     inline double XPrimaryDriver::pop(std::vector<char>::iterator &it) {
00286     return _pop_double(it);
00287 }
00288 template <>
00289     inline void XPrimaryDriver::push(char x) {
00290     _push_char(x, rawData());
00291 }
00292 template <>
00293     inline void XPrimaryDriver::push(unsigned char x) {
00294     _push_char(static_cast<char>(x), rawData());
00295 }
00296 template <>
00297     inline void XPrimaryDriver::push(int16_t x) {
00298     _push_int16_t(x, rawData());
00299 }

00301     inline void XPrimaryDriver::push(uint16_t x) {
00302     _push_int16_t(static_cast<int16_t>(x), rawData());

00306     _push_int32_t(x, rawData());
00307 }
00308 template <>
00309     inline void XPrimaryDriver::push(uint32_t x) {
00310     _push_int32_t(static_cast<int32_t>(x), rawData());
00311 }
00312 template <>
00313     inline void XPrimaryDriver::push(float f) {
00314     union {
00315         int32_t x;
00316         float y;
00317     } uni;
00318     C_ASSERT(sizeof(uni.x) == sizeof(uni.y));
00319     uni.y = f;
00320     _push_int32_t(uni.x, rawData());
00321 }
00322 template <>
00323     inline void XPrimaryDriver::push(double x) {
00324     _push_double(x, rawData());
00325 }

00354         int32_t x;
00355         float y;

00359     _push_int32_t(uni.x, buf);
